author: Tony Tobin
method: To make the ganache, whisk the cream until it holds soft peaks, then fold through the chestnut purée. Sandwich half the ganache mixture between the two slices of ginger cake. Add the remaining ganache to the top layer. For the chocolate sauce, melt the chocolate in a pan with the cream, then pour over the ginger cake layers. Serve with a scoop of ice cream.
ingredients: 142ml/5fl oz double cream,  ½ tin chestnut purée,  2 thick slices ready-made ginger cake,  50g/2oz chocolate,  50ml/2fl oz double cream,  stem ginger ice cream, to serve
